Organization.name: Caisse d'Allocations Familiales (CAF)
Organization.description: Provides family allowances, financial aid, and social services to families in France.

Organization.name: Maison Départementale des Solidarités (MDS)
Organization.description: Offers social services and support, particularly for vulnerable groups such as families, children, and elderly.

Organization.name: France Travail
Organization.description: Formerly known as Pôle Emploi, this organization supports job seekers and offers employment services across France.

Organization.name: Aide Sociale à l'Enfance (ASE)
Organization.description: Provides child protection services, including support for unaccompanied minors and at-risk children.

Organization.name: Caisse Primaire d'Assurance Maladie (CPAM)
Organization.description: Manages health insurance and ensures access to healthcare services in France.

Organization.name: Caisse Nationale d'Assurance Maladie (CNAM)
Organization.description: National body responsible for managing health insurance and related social security services in France.

Organization.name: Mutualité Sociale Agricole (MSA)
Organization.description: Provides social security and health services to workers in the agricultural sector in France.

Organization.name: Centre National des Œuvres Universitaires et Scolaires (CNOUS)
Organization.description: Coordinates student services across France, including housing, scholarships, and social support.

Organization.name: Centre Régional des Œuvres Universitaires et Scolaires (CROUS)
Organization.description: Regional centers providing support and services to students, including housing, meals, and financial aid.

Organization.name: Agence Régionale de Santé (ARS)
Organization.description: Regional Health Agency responsible for implementing health policies and ensuring access to healthcare in French regions.

Organization.name: Association de Gestion du Fonds pour l'Insertion Professionnelle des Personnes Handicapées (AGEFIPH)
Organization.description: Supports the employment of people with disabilities by providing funding and resources for their professional integration.

Organization.name: Caisse Nationale de Solidarité pour l'Autonomie (CNSA)
Organization.description: Manages funds and services for the elderly and people with disabilities in France.

Organization.name: Fonds de Développement pour la Jeunesse (FDJ)
Organization.description: Supports youth development initiatives, including education, employment, and social integration programs.

Organization.name: Mission Locale
Organization.description: Provides employment support, social services, and guidance for young people aged 16-25 in France.

Organization.name: Direction Régionale des Entreprises, de la Concurrence, de la Consommation, du Travail et de l'Emploi (DIRECCTE)
Organization.description: Regional Directorate responsible for employment, labor regulation, and economic development.

Organization.name: Agence Régionale de Santé de France (ARSF)
Organization.description: Manages regional health policies and services, ensuring public health and safety across France.

Organization.name: Caisse Nationale de Solidarité pour l'Autonomie (CNSA)
Organization.description: Administers services and funding for elderly and disabled individuals to support autonomy and care.

Organization.name: Direction de l'Administration Pénitentiaire (DAP)
Organization.description: Oversees the management of the prison system in France, including rehabilitation programs and prisoner rights.

Organization.name: Office Français de l'Immigration et de l'Intégration (OFII)
Organization.description: Provides services related to immigration, integration, and asylum seekers, including support for employment and housing.

Organization.name: Observatoire de la Protection de l'Enfance (OPIQ)
Organization.description: Monitors and improves child protection policies and practices across France.
